properties.site-address: Units 1-8 Castle Park Road, Whiddon Valley Barnstaple EX32 8PA
properties.ownership: not owned by a public authority
properties.notes: "The site is allocated within the emerging North Devon & Torridge Local Plan to deliver an alternative secondary vehicular access in to the adjoining Westacott urban extension (BAR01) for approximately 950 dwellings, 5 ha of land for economic uses and community facilities. If this site is required for such a route then once an adoptable standard highway, including appropriate landscaping has been delivered and the existing business has been re-located then residential uses could be delivered on any land that remains. Until such time as a potential secondary access route has been agreed through to BAR01 then housing on this site would only be acceptable after this time."
